tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Happy birthday madam and thanks for your sharing your valuable day for my twin kids birth happy birthday once again

As a young girl never thought i would be able to deliver normally but if it was nor Dr.Nirmala mam then it would have not been possible such a great human being she is soo humble and polite with all the patients 
She is the one who gave me all the strength and positivity throughout my pregnancy I would no doubt recommend her for sureeeee go for it no second thoughts if its Dr.Nirmala mam‚ù§Ô∏è
Doctor is very good explained everything clearly, didn't suggest unnecessary scan, only problem is waiting time  it was more than one hour

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Super.*** **** *** ******** **** **** ********** May god Bless Doctor garu  long live with good health.

my wife got pains & rushed to Green city hospital.  Due to non availability of any doctor that time, baby was taken out by one nurse there (Normal delivery). My baby was expired after his treatment in another hospital referred by them.  ** **** *** ******** ********* ** ***** **** ********* She was discharged on next day without giving her any treatment.  We went there after 1Week for review. No treatment was given to her even she was having pain in stomach & bleeding. 
On 24th she got serious health problem again. It is come to know that there were some particles left inside & due to infection of the same, she got continues heavy bleeding.  By got grace, she was escaped from unwanted things. 
This is all of improper & negligence of Green city hospital, Bangalore
Very good and caring doctor. Definitely not money oriented. She is always positive and discuss with lot of patience

I am new to this hospital and our first visit for pregnancy confirmation to my wife. She was very caring and explain the precautions which we have to take during this period with patience. At one stage my wife causes to bleeding for some time and she has taken care suggested best approach to avoid such cases. We follow the same and now we blessed with a Baby Boy without any issue as a Normal Delivery.

Really appreciate such care on patients and suggestion.

This is my first pregnancy  and m into 29th week & till now everything is going good, baby health & growth is also fine.. my only worry is it heard some bad comments for Dr.NirMalaysia from one of my colegue so that m little worried to get treatment form said Doctor. . . Please suggest.

Dr.Nirmala is too good. I had a high risk pregnancy & the chances of premature baby was more. In spite of all these issues I was able to deliver my baby at 37th week. Dr.Nirmala, ,Dr. Padmashree & the nurses showed care on us. She never gives false promise. The hospital economical also. I strongly recommend this hospital.

I had thyroid and irregular period since years ago i am consulting from  8 yrs n i have got amazimg result by her medicines n consultation,  Dr nirmala mam she is absolutely caring like mother and well experienced and aslo vry less cost compare to other hospitals.. n womens who r suffering from infertility, thyroid, pcod do consult  her get best result  üòä
